remarks: According to statement 7 in [Huneke] p. 2:  "For each vertex v, there are exactly ( k 2 ) paths with length two having v in the middle, ..." in a finite k-regular graph.  For simple paths of length 2 represented by ordered triples, we have again k*(k-1) such paths.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 10-Mar-2018.)
